lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: It's important to  make positive contributions.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a photographer/archivist for the City & County of San Francisco, PUC. I photograph infrastructure & manage the historical collection. When I'm off, I photograph the way I see the world.

lenders.name: Ken and Sue
lenders.loan_because: It's such a great way to help people who I will never get to meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the world of philanthropy (primarily in the area of medical research).  My job is to help provide funding to scientists doing important work in autism, cancer, diabetes, lupus and other areas

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone that wants to work hard and make something of themselves deserves the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people that have legal problems in the criminal system navigate their way through the system trying to reach the best result for their life.

lenders.name: Micki
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have great ideas for helping others. I help them take action steps towards making their ideas become reality through support, accountability and business development.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to do this to help me if I were in need...

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I see no reason not to.  Ever since i heard of Kiva i have been fascinated by the whole concept.  I've spent less than $100 and have helped over 7 individuals and groups try to make a better life for themselves.  It is nothing to me but everything to them and that makes it worth while for me.
lenders.occupational_info: when big concerts tour the world they have huge light shows that are a part of their performance.  I work on the light shows for them.  Sometimes operating the show and sometimes setting it up and fixing broken things.  It is a mixture of art and technology

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all have a responsibility to help the people around us become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I spent about 30 years in the computer industry in quality control, Engineering, and Marketing.

lenders.name: Rommy
lenders.loan_because: it's easy. it's awesome. it helps others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: i lived in the US. then i lived in europe. then i lived in canada. now I live in the US again.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: as the Kiva journals demonstrate, a small amount of money can help improve the lives of many people.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze data as part of an effort to reduce the number of deaths and injuries from consumer products.

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business in 1987 just after graduating college.  It was relatively easy for me to start the business but I know it can be extremely hard for others elsewhere in the world.  I understand the entreprenurial spirit!!
lenders.occupational_info: I design commercial interior spaces like offices, retirement communities, and most often hospitals.  I work for a large engineering and architecture company as well as work for myself part time.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I thought what a great idea to give to someone to support their business so in return they can support thier family.
lenders.occupational_info: Assistant Secretary for a High School

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to be a good world citizen and contribute to human success.  Anyone who has achieved any amount of success had someone who supported them.  Kiva is a great place to provide support to courageous people seeking self-empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Industrial/Organizational Social Worker.  My specialty is organizational development, employee relations/ training/education and career management.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who need a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the office of a movie production company.

lenders.name: christopher
lenders.loan_because: gotta keep those lovin' good vibrations happenin'
lenders.occupational_info: entertainment industry

lenders.name: Belle
lenders.loan_because: i know how important having access to credit is to a small business.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a genuine way to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a small business that sells automobile maintenance products.

lenders.name: Dave & Heidi
lenders.loan_because: Helping others makes us feel warm inside. Kind of like when you do a shot of rum, except better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Metallurgy at a community college.  Heidi is a clinical dietitian at a hospital.

lenders.name: Daryl
lenders.loan_because:
There will always be poor people in the land. Therefore I command you to be openhanded toward your brothers and toward the poor and needy in your land.  
Deuteronomy 15:11

lenders.name: rob
lenders.loan_because: I believe that those that have are morally obliged to share with those who have less, especially when it leads to self-sufficiency.
lenders.occupational_info: I design lighting for theatre and architecture

lenders.name: eebudee
lenders.loan_because: I want to help motivated, ingenious, hardworking people make their communities better by starting & growing their own business. Sustainability and pride in your work isn't just the "American Dream".

lenders.name: PIERRE
lenders.loan_because: Micro financing is a great idea. It connects\r\npeople across culture, religion and race.
lenders.occupational_info: I commission the manufacturing of Hand knotted\r\ncarpets in Afghanistan

lenders.name: Maudie
lenders.loan_because: I love start ups and helping people who might not have local alternatives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and coach others in their work.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters.
lenders.occupational_info: Pastor of small missional United Methodist Church.

lenders.name: Erich
lenders.loan_because: I have it too easy to not  help.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help host a giant festival out in the Black Rock Desert in the state of Nevada in the United States.  In 2008 there were 50,000 people from all over the world that attended for a week.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: I think it is psychologically empowering for a small business owner to know that someone believes and trusts in them.  The benefits of the financial loan go beyond the actual dollars.
lenders.occupational_info: Founder and Principal of an independent fee only investement management and financial planning firm.

lenders.name: Paul & Chris
lenders.loan_because: Its fun to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I give advice.

lenders.name: Kathie
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for my life and want to support others to achieve their goals.  I truly believe that a hand up is always better than a hand out.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I needed help when I started my business.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Olana made me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's lending strategy is twofold in its brilliance — not only are we not donating, and thereby giving away, our money, (only its liquidity!) we're also not creating a situation where recipients could become dependent on foreign aid or handouts; they use the money to expand their endeavors in such a way that it's sustainable (and they prove it by repaying the loan.)

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Our neighbor is not just the person accross the street, and if it were me and the rolls were reversed I would pray that god would send someone to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital emergency room and I am put my self through nursing school. I am also a member of a fire department.

lenders.name: Button
lenders.loan_because: Everyone always talks about the need to eradicate global poverty, but complains about there being nothing they can personally do.  This is something that anyone can do to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the Peace Corps Master's International program at the Josef Korbel School for International Studies at the University of Denver.  I study International Development, Humanitarian Assistance, and Human Rights.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference to somebody somewhere

lenders.name: mary & brien
lenders.loan_because: a little to us sometimes means an awful lot to many in other countries.

lenders.name: AndY
lenders.loan_because: Beat poverty! Raise others to a better standard of living! Feel good about doing something! What’s not to give?!?

lenders.name: Martin & Angela
lenders.loan_because: We hope to bring a brighter future to the world by offering this wonderful service.
lenders.occupational_info: Martin works at a large home improvement retailer in learning. Angela works as a high school math teacher.

lenders.name: Mubomu (Tom)
lenders.loan_because: Nimebarikwa kwa sababu watu wazuri wa Kenya nilifundishe kuisha vizuri.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Maths forms 1-4 in a school with 200 students.

lenders.name: Omar
lenders.loan_because: Lending a helping hand is a blessing in itself.

lenders.name: Jack and Donna
lenders.loan_because: It important and needed.
lenders.occupational_info: We have traveled and seen the need.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: With Kiva, it's so easy to leverage a small amount of money into a large amount of help. A link to my Kiva pin map is below. Left clicking a face on the map takes you to their Kiva page.

lenders.name: Yuni
lenders.loan_because: It is one of the best ideas I have heard in a long time!
lenders.occupational_info: I make documentaries

lenders.name: Summer and Graeme
lenders.loan_because: we believe that everyone is equal. We believe that if we have the means then we can provide the way for others. We believe that you should treat others the way you wish to be treated
lenders.occupational_info: We\'re kids. Our parents work. Our mother is the communication director for a non profit and our father is a salesman. We just go to school, ride bikes and scooters and play piano.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I have the power to help myself, I have the power to help you, and together we have the power to help the world-----Love is not violent.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a computer and network repair technician.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: Frontline showed me a way I can truely help people to be independent within their own culture.  To empower someone is a wonderful thing.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing Communications

lenders.name: Ravi
lenders.loan_because: The best way to uplift people and countries out of poverty is by helping them be self-sufficient.  That is why I am lending through Kiva.  I hope more people will do the same.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: It never hurts to help!

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I\'m a lender by trade and like to be able to assist in other parts of the world and make a difference. Businesses stimulate economies and my small injection of debt helps in its small way too.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money for a large bank (ANZ Bank) to commercial or business customers in American Samoa in the Pacific Islands.

lenders.name: Craig & Mary
lenders.loan_because: Silicon Valley was good to us - now it's our turn.  Zero overhead and all the $ goes directly to entrepreneurs willing to take the risk and put in the hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: Over 30 years in sales and marketing in "high tech." Now we're volunteer-holics and love it.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: We belong to each other

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: While I do not believe that democracy is alive and well in the US, I believe capitalism is.  That is what is truly keeping the US together.  I would like to see my brothers and sisters in other countries enjoying the benefits of a capitalist system that the US takes for grant it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computer software.

lenders.name: Rebeckah
lenders.loan_because: I have been looking for something like this for a long time.  Some charities eat all of the donations up in admin. fees.  This is a great chance to help someone directly.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: This is an exceptional opportunity to help other individuals out when they need it.  I know how hard it can be to make ends meet when you don\'t have any credit.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large community college.  I meet with students in training classes at corporate partners and explain the partnership and credit they are eligible to receive from their training.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is an effective tool.  I also want to recognize and encourage the dreams and hopes of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of 4 children aged 11-4.  I returned to school to do two university degrees at age 38 and now work with families and children who are having difficulties.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I think it is my duty to the world to help people in need. Donating to these people not only helps them but once their business is off the ground they will help others by giving their services.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a sixth grade student

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: For a few dollars that I would have wasted here on coffee or lunch, I could ultimately change a life for the better across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I schedule staff, order inventory, communications with phone & computer, guest registration....

lenders.name: Gwyn
lenders.loan_because: Many people lended me a direct hand along my life path when I thought my chances for success were insurmountable.  Kiva is way that I can return the favors granted to me when I was struggling.
lenders.occupational_info: I primarily focus on sales operations and employee development.  This includes responsibilities such as designing complex sales incentive programs to sales methodology and training.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: people need money

lenders.name: Steven & Lynne
lenders.loan_because: In the current world it is the right thing to do and Kiva makes it possible for people to help other people directly through incountry organizations.
lenders.occupational_info:
I worked with surface water quantity and quality and interpreted soil capability and characteristics.
I an a Nurse working with children

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with hardworking women around the globe.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in my life and now I have the ability to help other single moms who just need a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I work to understand what people want and need to live a healthier life

lenders.name: Winnie
lenders.loan_because: direct loans to indivuals for more immediate results, by passes bureauracy so funds go to person who needs
lenders.occupational_info: live on small acreage (by our standards) where I pasture some milk cows and have four pet goats. In summer small 2 bedroom Bed and Breakfast for travelers. Raise my own fruits and vegetables.

lenders.name: Klaus
lenders.loan_because: it is a must to help, if you can -
lenders.occupational_info: 55 years old man traveling between different worlds

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by God so much and i intend to share these blessings because of His love for me

lenders.name: R.D. Davis
lenders.loan_because: I started a business and wish someone would have helped me. Knowing how much a little money goes means a lot. I hope my twin girls will feel the need to help when they get older.
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep the restaurant business by making sure their equipment is running properly and their food doesn't spoil by keeping it coooooool.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: A hand-up > a hand-out.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We need to be brothers & sisters, even across many miles, in order to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend college and work in a little town in California about 25 miles from San Francisco.

lenders.name: andy
lenders.loan_because: Im fortunate enought to be able to do so!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: because I can.

lenders.name: Maria Fernanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need, and perhaps make this world a better place for our future generations

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am just a steward of His money. He is letting me use it, so it should be used for His glory.
lenders.occupational_info: I package heirloom vegetable seeds to be shipped out and planted all over the country. I also grow plants and harvest the seed to sell.

lenders.name: Mike and Julie
lenders.occupation: retired wildlife biologist and retired teacher

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to obtain financing for agriculture.  I raise cattle here in the USA and I want to know that my contributions are helping someone else in agriculture somewhere across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an accounting office as a debt collector during the day.  Evenings, I work with our cows on the ranch.  Our ranch has suffered from drought for several years; I must work off of the farm to make ends meet!  It is very gratifying to know that I can help someone else struggling to make an agricultural enterprise succeed.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: It is a meaningful way in which to help people improve their lives and fulfill their dreams of self-sufficiency

lenders.name: Van
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean stormwater so we can have healthy rivers and lakes.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me an alterego - I'm a loan shark in Bulgaria, Togo, and Cambodia. Where else can you do that? :-)

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: i\'m deeply committed to the fight for social and economic justice for women and people of color around the world.  i can\'t give very much now, but i\'m working on it!
lenders.occupational_info: i do fund development and grant writing for an economic and social justice non profit in East Los Angeles, California, USA

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I live comfortably and want others to be able to share in the privileges I have in Canada and be able to live better lives wherever they live. I believe in making life better for others - especially if they want to work at it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business man and financial advisor who is also involved as a volunteer in my community.

lenders.name: Ilirijan
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently majoring in International Studies and Japanese.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: it\'s a good way to help the small businessperson without lots of administrative overhead.  I'm hoping that others in need will be encouraged when they see that they can get help for a business idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Living the dream in Colorado

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.occupational_info: I am a birth and labor coach, encouraging, calming and helping women during labor and delivery of their babies.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women in poverty to rise above it.

lenders.name: Madzia and Rob
lenders.loan_because: We know how hard it is to start.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay forward the opportunities that I was blessed with so that others can achieve success in supporting themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Amy & Tim
lenders.loan_because: we can

lenders.name: Yasmin & Rob
lenders.loan_because: We want to empower people who don\'t have access to the same resources & opportunities as the rest of us in the Western world.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: It helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids aged 11 to 15. I help them socially, emotionally, and academically. I wouldn't trade my job for anything.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Writing business cases and coordinating small to medium information technology projects. Customer management.

lenders.name: SIA at MSU
lenders.loan_because: We want to invest in a better standard of living for those all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: The Student Investment Association (SIA) was established to educate students about investing and provide our members with the resources needed for the development of their investment knowledge for market and stock analysis. The intention is to learn how to invest in a straight forward and profitable manner.\r\n

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I relieve pain and suffering.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed and I want to share my blessings
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sure that there is no discrimination in our business and everyone is treated fairly, respectfully, and consistently.

lenders.name: Rod and Avis
lenders.loan_because: To run your own business is a way to gain income, dignity, and respect.  Every person needs that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling protection against unforseen disaster that might happen to a business or home.  Damages caused by fire, wind, theft, and so on.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: When I began my massage therapy practice it was a client who believed in me enough to loan me $1000. for start-up costs. She was a lovely lady from Latvia who I repaid in massages. Tekla has since passed, but I will never forget her compassionate gesture.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a certified massage therapist who performs therapeutic massage on the table (western style) and also on the floor (Thailand style ). I also teach both styles of massage and have a teaching certification from Thailand. I have been practicing for 10 years.

lenders.name: B. J.
lenders.loan_because: dreams need to be helped along to become realities.
lenders.occupational_info: helping people find order and balance in their work lives.

lenders.name: Cliff
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nursing student in southern Arizona.

lenders.name: Chau
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to Africa and seen the great need of the wonderful people there.  I believe this is an excellent means to assist the entrepeneurs who are trying to make a difference in their families\' lives.

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: we believe in sharing our good fortune and abundance with others.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in need

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I love reading the stories, and want to help in any way that i can.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to help others with a hand up, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Gary & Cathy
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help in developing countries. I like the interaction and the progress reports. What goes around comes around !!

lenders.name: Oakman
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense, being an economic major and working in the financial industry, why not. This is seed money and needed capital for small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school full time and work full time.  I usually make lending decision on behalf of my institution.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of helping out and I know exactly where my money is going.
lenders.occupational_info: My work entails formulating all the diets for the animals that live at the zoo.  I also conduct all the research involved on a nutrition stand point.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides a great opportunity to help people in a direct way.
lenders.occupational_info: Married 32 years, one 21 year old daughter, at Furman University, ten cats.

lenders.name: SHIN
lenders.loan_because: It's important for me to help people who don't have the resources and opportunities that I enjoy.

lenders.name: Judy Marie Marks-Sutter
lenders.loan_because: I love to see how a new business can thrive with a little help to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked very hard all my life, starting with our family farm. Then working in different factories. Now I have a job working in an office on a powerful computer designing automotive parts.  I love my job and am very happy.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro finance and in the incentives of capitalism to lift people from poverty through their own efforts and imagination.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught Entrepreneurship and Economics.

lenders.name: The 4 Hertels
lenders.loan_because: "what lies behind us and what lies before us are small matters compared to what lies within us" - emerson

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: it's such a simple way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Edgar
lenders.loan_because: Any lifeform can love his neighbor, only humans (that we know of) can be neighbors to someone that lives on the other side of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My main interests are in the design of circuits, systems, and analytical tools to better understand neurons and the brain.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: Iam so blessed with the wealth of my father, I must share it or it means nothing\\\\\\\'\\\\\\\' to live in the USA and to have a open hand / mind set.what you hold on to you lose ,what you let go of you receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint homes , and I paint a faux finish look, on walls and ceilings, it\\\\\\\"s pretty wild painting. my goal is to give 25.00 $ a mouth, mere pocket change.you sow  seed god waters it and makes it grow god is a eternal ivestment with the best return on your money that you can make .

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Its time we help others
lenders.occupational_info: repair powered equipment and machines

lenders.name: Todd & Jessy
lenders.loan_because: we can!  We are the lucky ones.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are not as fortunate as I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I love playing sports and working. My work is fun and exciting, but very demanding. I also like to spend time with family and friends.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: with Kiva you know exactly where your money is going and who will use it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional nurse and I help teach people how to have good health and I also care for them when they are physically or mentally sick.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I could buy a cup of coffee at Starbucks, or I could change someone\'s life halfway around the world. But it\'s not like I would even go to Starbucks in the first place.
lenders.occupational_info: I convince people at newspapers and TV stations that they should cover the story I am trying to sell.

lenders.name: Joy & Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have been to third world countries and see how much help, such a small donation can do. I only hope that I can keep adding to my amount to help more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time for a trasportation company that moves packages around the world. Also a part time student, studing to be a nurse.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: Development will only occur if poor people in the Third-World pull themselves out of poverty, not through some fancy Western plan. Access to credit allows them a chance to do this.

lenders.name: Joel and Amity
lenders.loan_because: Foreign aid makes people and countries dependent. Loans help them change their own lives.

lenders.name: Evie
lenders.loan_because:
I care.   =~D

I have always wanted to help make the world better and happier for all of us.  
 
Fortunately, Kiva helps provide an opportunity to do that.
lenders.occupational_info:
I believe its very important to be a good parent & 
                              mentor for our young people. 
   Set a good example through your actions and leadership.  

   I research and write about social justice issues and hopefully 
  inspire people to care more about each other and 
                               this world we share.

  Participate in your community; be a voice for positive change!  
  I teach, design and paint to create more beauty in the world.  
  We should leave a place better than how we found it. 

 I grow plants in a small garden to share vegetables, fruit and 
  flowers with family & friends.  We have walnuts, peppers, 
 oranges, tomatoes, limes, parsley, lemons, rosemary, 
                        pomegranates, and grapes.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I have learned of the great effectiveness of micro lending and how it can dramatically improve the lives of those who participate.   I also wanted a personal connection with and direct link to those who recieve the loans.  Finally, I receive feedback from those who received loans about the difference it made in their lives and communities!
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with over 100 different non-profit organizations (non-governmental organizations) and government agencies at the local, national and international level.  I assist large and small organizations with strategic planning services, meeting facilitation, program and service design, and facilitate collaborative planning sessions of multiple organizations who wish to work together more effectively.

lenders.name: Hijabis4ever.com
lenders.loan_because: Al'humdulilah Allah makes it possible.
lenders.occupational_info: Very fullfilling.

lenders.name: Jody & Leah
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with good friends, family, health, & financial security.  We want others to be blessed also.  We are grateful for the opportunity to give.  Thank you Kiva:)
lenders.occupational_info: It's a family business.  Jody is an electrician, working mainly on service stations, Leah and their daughter run the office.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: Love the idea of helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a former music business product manager/video producer who gave up life in NYC to move back to FLA and work with horses. "

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in our country, it's obscene.  We need to care more about the rest of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classical piano to children

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I was raised in a low income(poor) family\r\nin the USA. It took me 20 years to go through college at nights while working full time days. People need a helping hand to get a start in life.\r\nHuman LOVE.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for everyone and answer to everyone.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: At the moment, my life is good. \r\nMy family is healthy, and I earn money. \r\nso I try to help other poeple on the direct way.

lenders.name: Nick & Amy
lenders.loan_because: it creates an opportunity to help others help themselves. We desire to see those we partner with succeed in providing for their families and transforming their communities for the greater good.
lenders.occupational_info: Nick runs an IT business in India and Amy is learning Hindi - both are learning to adjust to a new culture!

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: These folks need a helping hand, and it's GREAT foreign policy.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to be self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: US Army Medic.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I am making a small positive impact on the lives of people who face many challenges and hardships.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and help college students who desire to enter business - particularly those interested in entrepreneurial endeavors.

lenders.name: ming
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Project Manager.  I am not sure what that means.  I do know it means I wear as many hats as requested.  Most the time I work with Sales, Marketing, and Production

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: It's one small way to change the world.

lenders.name: Liz T.
lenders.loan_because: I am in a position to be able to loan amounts that are relatively small to me, but that can make a world of difference in the lives of others. When I think about the huge ripple effect my small loans can make in a community, it gives me a lot of inspiration. I am happy if I can be part of a solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a research ethics review board at a major University. We make sure that human research participants are being treated fairly and ethically, and that their rights, welfare and safety are being protected.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: successful business ownership provides a foundation for successful communities, families and individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: My mission is to help anybody who chooses to use business ownership as a means of accomplishing their dreams to \"learn & do\" the business basics required for them to optimize their success and profitability.

lenders.name: Aubrey
lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to support developing nations is to directly assist the people who live there.

lenders.name: Dona
lenders.loan_because: Many have helped me and I want to pass that on - particularly to other women, although not limited to women.
lenders.occupational_info: Designer of jewelry, dog jackets, and other items. Writer and graphic designer. Graphic designer for NYLA - Nonviolent Youth Leadership Alliance. Animal rights activist. Nonviolence for all life is my goal.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I can... I hope it helps
lenders.occupational_info: I sell agricultural tools

lenders.name: Dutton/Haggerty Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to and we can.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: I watched the program Frontline do a feature on Kiva and I was motivated to loan because I think the organization and people at Kiva are doing a remarkable thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I write words.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to receive loans in my life and I believe everyone should have access to loans in order to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach French/Francophone language, literature and culture to American college students. / Je suis prof de français aux E-U.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: It\'s a great opportunity to reach out and help others
lenders.occupational_info: I help people heal through caring touch.

lenders.name: azizah
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Jo
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help someone who feels that they can make a better life for themselves and their family with just that little extra capital.  The entrepreneurial spirit should be encouraged, especially on an individual scale in nations that have had high degrees of poverty.  I also feel strongly that if someone is willing to work to achieve their goals, we should help when we can.  The ideal world is where we all help each other, isn't it?
lenders.occupational_info: I help people navigate through potentially stressful major life changes!

lenders.name: The Caragol Family
lenders.loan_because: Having traveled extstenivly we have met many people who have the determination to provide for their themselves, but just need a little hand to get started. We began our businesses with a loan from our family.  From that we have been able to continuaaly develop our business and provide well for our family.  We also see it as a way to \"pay back\"  for all of the kindnesses we recieved from people throughout the world while on our travels.
lenders.occupational_info: We started with lawn mowing, then bought a house and fixed it up, then bought more houses and now we develop infill projects.

lenders.name: Châu
lenders.occupational_info: I teach univeristy students about mechanical engineering and do research about diamagnetic levitation. I also tutor physics.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I loan because, thank God, I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I\'m in medical school, in the middle of a career change.  Before that I owned a graphic design company that specialized in fashion and textiles.

lenders.name: Spiritual Dessert Club
lenders.loan_because: Dick P, Dick F, Judy, Hank, Pat, Eleanor, Margaret, Jane all do this together.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: there's so little i do that i feel makes a real impact in the world.  kiva fulfills my desire to help others.

lenders.name: Aspiring Philanthopist
lenders.loan_because: The World will be a safer, more fun, and entirely better place for us all, once everyone is living comfortably.  Equality of opportunity is the key to World peace.
lenders.occupational_info:
I learn how to think critically through experiences in my personal life and in the classroom.  I like science and astronomy.  I've always wanted to make a lot of money, and then give it all away, so Kiva has been a wonderful experience.  I remember hearing about it in a Poli Sci classroom and almost immediately joining and funding loans.  To me Kiva is the ultimate, give a man or teach a man, approach to helping people.

I develop websites, sell Real Estate in NYC, and help publicize new an innovative product lines for an upstart health and fitness company.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are all connected.  That we all impact each others live no matter how far we are from each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I've been given more opportunities than others, and I'd like to pass that along.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in technology, and I hope to make the world a better place through technology.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I used to live in Botswana & Russia, involved with small business consulting and education projects.  I have a strong interest in international development.
lenders.occupational_info: I help set goals and objectives for projects and then measure the data and results to determine if the goals are met.   My job is to determine the effectiveness of the projects I watch.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: It\'s a way to help make a positive difference in someone else\'s life.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Every Christmas I get my daughter and two stepdaughters a \"sister present\"  - which is the same gift for all three.  This year each of them will receive money to lend to someone who is desiring a better life for themselves or their families.  It is our legacy of love, gratitude,  and the true spirit of Christmas.

lenders.name: Desiree
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to.

lenders.name: Rod and Avis
lenders.loan_because: Owning your own business is a way to earn income, dignity and respect.

lenders.name: Charles Toepfer
lenders.loan_because: The lending system is broken.

lenders.name: woof
lenders.loan_because: of a jimmineycricket in my ear.
lenders.occupational_info: landlady

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.occupational_info: I study how people value goods and services.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I saw the show on PBS and thought it was a small way for us to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Fire Fighting: if your house burns I try to keep it from destroying all your possessions or hurting your family.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: microfinance lending truly makes a difference!

lenders.name: Patrick Hogan
lenders.loan_because: It's something I feel I ought to do.
lenders.occupational_info: self-employed creater of simple jewelry which I sell on the street, at flea markets, farmers markets, and craft fairs.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: People deserve the right to have a chance at making their lives better. KIVA offers them that chance and gives me an opportunity to directly and positively affect people from around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: AmeriCorps

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: knowing that without me doing a lot, I can actually make someone\'s dream come true.....and it makes me extremely happy!

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day, writing computer software.  Right now I work for a company that sells networking equipment to phone companies and internet service providers.  But I would much rather be outside running or riding my bike!!

lenders.name: Julie Seberry
lenders.loan_because: I hope I can help someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: A teacher to children who have a hard time learning.

lenders.name: Sari Lynn
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I solve computer problems over the phone.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be in a situation where I can.

lenders.name: Chris Nuckols
lenders.occupation: www.alibris.com: CS Mgr - Tools and Analytics

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of individuals helping individuals.  I have been very blessed in my life, often due to the guidance and input of others.  I would like to \"pay it forward.\"
lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing consultant, I help companies identify a fit between the needs of their customers and the benefits their products/services can offer.

lenders.name: Ed P
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at some time.  I hope that these small businesses grow to enrich their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage real estate, large computer rooms, mechanical and electrical equipment.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It may help

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: It makes sence to help people who want to improve their work & lives and are asking for such little help.
lenders.occupational_info: Residental remodeling Contractor. New Kitchens and Bathrooms.

lenders.name: damon
lenders.loan_because: its a way to help people sustain themselves without taking advantage of them with interest
lenders.occupational_info: sitting, talking, writing

lenders.name: greg and kirsten
lenders.loan_because: we loved the idea of lending a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work at universities

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art, design, and computer skills to college students.

lenders.name: Zarlakhta
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering the common man, the plebian, to help him construct his own life with his own hands so he could pass on his values to the generations after.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student aspiring to go to Medical School in hopes of one day being able to help the common man in places where access to health care is almost inaccessible.

lenders.name: erik
lenders.loan_because: i like chicken and the sartorial arts.
lenders.occupational_info: trying

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It\\\\\\\'s my pleasure to loan money to someone who can use it to better there situation. If the small amount of money that I loan can make a difference then its all worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Branch Manager for Wells Fargo Financial. I help coach and mentor individuals to achieve there sales goals and objectives. Also I lend money to customers.

lenders.name: Steve and Megan
lenders.occupational_info: Megan is studying to become a teacher for children and young adults with disabilities. Her program focuses on teaching academics, communication, social skills, and daily living skills to students with physical, cognitive, vision and hearing disabilities. She wants to support all children in participating and being included in their schools and communities.\r\n\r\nSteve studies genetics and molecular biology of plants. He is studying how genes turn on and off to better understand how living organisms grow.

lenders.name: Andy King
lenders.loan_because: My money could either buy me a few movies and some cheesecake, or help people expand their horizons.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in school, studying anthropology and sociology. I like writing too.

lenders.name: Minoo
lenders.loan_because: "The earth is but one country; and mankind its citizens."

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: ,I can

lenders.name: Jeffery
lenders.loan_because: We are all one people on this earth and I have been very blessed. I feel very good that we together can help each other in this way.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people. I believe that small businesses are the best way to raise the standard of living of under developed nations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am President and CEO of an information technology consulting firm.  We are a small business so I know what it takes to succeed in running your small business.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a blessing every now and then.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a nurse working for a wonderful non profit hospice.

lenders.name: Jon & Patti
lenders.occupational_info: Retail Gift and Clothing Sales

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Without the help of others I would not be where I am today. Now it's my turn to return the favor.

lenders.name: Guglielmo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the money I lend is a long term investment. Although no interests are paid back, we will all gain by helping people in poor countries to reach economic independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I design web applications and work both as a professional consultant for firms and as an associate in a non-profit organization that developes e-transparency and open data solutions.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves and I like knowing how my donations help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers for a big company.

lenders.name: samuel
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I support people who raise funds for an international medical aid organisation.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: There is such a great discrepancy in wealth between the USA and the \\\\\\\"developing\\\\\\\" world. It is unconscionable to ignore this fact and not find some way to help out. I read the book by Yunnus, \\\\\\\"Banker to the Poor\\\\\\\" and was very touched by the stories. I feel this is one of the most effective ways to help people get out of abject poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed and own a small business with two employees and I\\\\\\\'m blessed with a good salary that does not require I spend much time at the office. I am now looking to \\\\\\\"give back\\\\\\\" as I have been given so much.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I can and gladly do so. Entrepeneurs facilitate growth within a society. Those who can must do.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am serving in the US Army but will be a civilian soon, looking forward to the 9-5 job and college. I\'m just starting out in the world myself.

lenders.name: E. Jethro
lenders.loan_because: There is a critical need for us as global citizens to be more concerned, involved, and compassionate towards our fellow citizens in need.  KIVA is one way that we can express our caring in a real and tangible way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an anthropologist, and a college professor.  I plant seeds (metaphorically) in my students' hearts and minds.  I then encourage them to water their intellectual, emotional and social awareness gardens: and, to nurture the outcomes. To further this work, each semester I ask each of my cultural anthropology sections (usually 4), to select one person or group to support by making a loan to them. This is a way that more can be done, and it serves as a tangible and real-life experience helping others in need.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I believe that in supporting small enterprises in develping countries promotes the global economy and democracy.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and work at an engineering company that designs pipe for oil refineries.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have more than I need.

lenders.name: Fritzi
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to assist people who are working to improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hospice nurse.  I take care of people who are expected to die within 6 months. I help provide comfort to them and to their families

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I create medicolegal documentation for hospitals and physicians regarding patient care.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity

lenders.name: Kim Min & MiSun
lenders.loan_because: through giving we are receiving..everyone deserves a chance!

lenders.name: Bob & Annie Jasinski
lenders.loan_because: Having worked in developing countries, we\'ve seen the huge impact that small loans can make!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and I wish to share those blessings with others. I am an artist, writer and own an art gallery.  As a female business owner, I would like to donate to empower other women around the world to be able to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a retail art gallery. My husband and I are both artists. In addition to our work, I also feature the work of several other artists.

lenders.name: Athena
lenders.loan_because: I want to decrease the total amount of suck in the world.  I can't do it alone, but together maybe we can.

lenders.name: Esa & Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I do service work for customers of the cable TV company here in Kelowna.

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the hope that people everywhere will  work creatively and honestly to improve the standard of living for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am recently retired but spent most of my working career in banking and finance. The concept of micro-lending, which Kiva represents, is very powerful and I support it entirely. Good luck to all.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to make a difference,promote peace, and perhaps make a better name for ordinary Americans across the world.  All that and you\'ll likely get your money back!
lenders.occupational_info: Player of many instruments, long career in the US and Europe.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I feel lucky to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I give tours of the Napa Valley Wine country on Bicycles, and of the state capitol to 4th graders That's my sweetie Peter. He's a technician for a phone company.

lenders.name: Mark, Andrea and Kate
lenders.loan_because: building economies and supporting entrepreneurs for the long term is better than direct aid.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I play the music of my Scandinavian ancestors....music brings the whole world together!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It\'s personal and more immediate for the donor to see a face, a person with whom to relate to.
lenders.occupational_info: Physical Therapy-Musician-Student

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help people solve problems

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Woodsdweller
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Trent
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others in a meaningful way.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I think its remarkable starting a business. I think what courage it is to pull all of it together in a poverish society. I really want to support that idea and orient my loans around similar passions as mine. The variation in gardening with plants, flowers and vegatables. How do we make a living at this? I support them and want to learn and be inspired by it all.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital laboratory.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Credit is a fundamental human right and organization should fostering self-respect and self-reliance. I loan because its an alternative to donor-recipient type relationships.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a student at a universtiy. Just finished reading \"the Price of a Dream\" - The sotry of the Grameen Bank by David Bornstein. Which was a great read. Another great book \"This Place on Earth\" by Alan Durning is page turner, quick easy read

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We consider ourselves a very fortunate family who would like to help others with their life dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Educational Technologist who works in a public school district to assist teachers with integrating technology into their instruction.  My wife is a 5th grade teacher, and my son is currently a college student.

lenders.name: Carrie & Craig
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe in: The inherent worth and dignity of every person;  the goal of world community with peace, liberty and justice for all;  and respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part. (http://uua.org/aboutuua/principles.html)
lenders.occupational_info: Carrie is a high school English teacher.  Craig is a criminal defense attorney.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in the world. I believe that if I have the means to help..I should do it.

lenders.name: (Jelani)
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a simple way to show gratitude.  It's exciting to watch how many lives can be touched by re-loaning and re-loaning. I believe we should find beauty on our path and then give it away.  You can do that with Kiva

lenders.name: Kim & Sophie
lenders.loan_because: I believe what goes around comes around. I love the stories! It's a way of traveling to new places and meeting special people in each of them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory that tests seeds to make sure they will grow and are not full of weeds. I also play classical violin in several local music groups and teach music to children.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school principal.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe that lifting people out of poverty is the way to world peace.  I chose Kiva because it appears to have high integrity and because it offers me a way to re-loan what I have already contributed and build a gift account that keeps on giving.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It\'s nice to help someone out.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people fix problems

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I\'m hoping that I will help someone become successful. This success might then help families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law library which provides legal information to the residents of my city.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: the richness of life comes from what we give, not from what we keep.

lenders.name: Angelique
lenders.loan_because: I know that we are all brothers & sisters on this earth trying to get by the best we can. We are not rich people but we want to help others when we can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I sell handmade Baby items & Craft Supplies out of my home online so I can be with my kids.

These are my 3 kids. The 2 young ones are boys. My youngest sons have long hair, then my daughter.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am very fortunate. I like what I do and it\'s easy work. I wish it was the same for all people.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I build businesses by mixing software, people and ideas

lenders.name: Peter y Carolina
lenders.loan_because:
It may teach my step-kids something about social responsibility and caring about somebody other than themselves.

They independently pick and choose the recipient. It is fun to watch them struggle with the decision of who's to receive a donation.

My plan to rollover repaid loans is beginning to work and my Kiva activity is rapidly becoming self-funded with the repaid loans.   

Here's a summary of the learning/lending events.

My Loan Summary
-----------------------------
Total Number of Loans ... 103 
Total Number of Defaults ...  3

note: subprime lenders would kill for results like this ;)
lenders.occupational_info: My work is typical for field work in the petroleum drilling industry: I work far too many hours for which I receive far too much money.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:19-21\r\nAfter a long time the master of those servants returned and settled accounts with them. The man who had received the five talents brought the other five. `Master,\' he said, `you entrusted me with five talents. See, I have gained five more.\'  \"His master replied, `Well done, good and faithful servant! You have been faithful with a few things; I will put you in charge of many things. Come and share your master\'s happiness!\'\r\n
lenders.occupational_info: A safe, secure home is part of the foundation of a healthy family.  When a family buys a home, they trust me to review the condition of the home before they make the final commitment to purchase it.

lenders.name: Lewises
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help at some point during their life. We feel fortunate to have the ability to help others, and think that even small acts can make a large difference.

lenders.name: Pilgrim
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped along the way by many people and Kiva provides a direct way for me to help others in turn.
lenders.occupational_info: Painting is a way to understand the world around us and to speak to the hearts of our fellow travelers.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Musician specialising in Early Music, I am a regular performer in an around the UK

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Helping others become more successful is important to me.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me the opportunity to help others improve their lives and  make the world a better place.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's financial help that gets people started on their own independence, not a charity that feeds a bottomless pit.  It's smart progress, not a band-aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large businesses create and maintain documents on computers that get sent to their customers, such as statements and correspondence.

lenders.name: Dane
lenders.loan_because: ...I am sick of spending all my money on beer...
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses market their products.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I like to help those much less fortunate than me. That is my zakat. Knowing about individuals needing help, and being able to make a difference makes it personable and always makes my day.

lenders.name: Marnie
lenders.loan_because: I can, thank God!  And because it works.

lenders.name: Daun
lenders.loan_because: I think the Kiva idea is a wonderful way to help people around the world whose lives are far more difficult than ours in the US.  I'd like to think I can make a difference even in a small way and do something meaningful with my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create, build and teach how to make theatre costumes.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: As an American (and citizen of the "developed world", I feel that no amount of money can make up for the harm my country has done to the stability of so many people in "developing" countries.  Through the few loans I make when I can - I hope to offset SOME of the damage.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants and refugees living and working in the United States.  I hope my efforts help others have a better life in their own homes so they won't end up in my classes, working as dishwashers in the United States.

lenders.name: Knight
lenders.loan_because: @ Kiva, a small help at the right hour could go a long way. Hats off to Kiva!

lenders.name: Ruby
lenders.loan_because: I love to see how it helps people change their lives.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: As a Christian, I want God's love to shine through my life and to make a positive difference in the lives of others. I believe that all people should have the opportunity to support their families and pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to encourage and help others in whatever I do in life.

lenders.name: Vidhan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people in the Third World have the ability to create a business that is profitable and raise their family out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying economics and business management and hope to work for a MFI

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: wealth redistribution in any form is a great thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to law school at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA).

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of giving back to the global community.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: Our desire is not that others might be relieved while you are hard pressed, but that there might be equality.  At the present time your plenty will supply what they need, so that in turn their plenty will supply what you need. Then there will be equality, as it is written: "He who gathered much did not have too much, and he who gathered little did not have too little."  - 2 Corinthians 8: 13-15
